entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few rain showers beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023
